THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Visual reinforcement: The thumbnail features eye-catching images of specific items of clothing and accessories, along with affirmative check marks, visually reinforcing the video’s promise to reveal valued or 'must-have' purchases referenced in the title ('I Wish I Bought these 12 Items SOONER!'). THUMBNAIL-TITLE RELATIONSHIP.Contrasts or mismatches: The thumbnail only displays five items, while the title refers to twelve; this is a standard YouTube practice to keep thumbnails simple and clickable but may leave some viewers expecting a broader product range than visually shown.
